text: OpenRoad Brewery is a brewery and tap room in Wayland, Michigan.Kuyt, Sherry (November 16, 2015). "Wayland Coffee Shop Plans to Add Brewery", MLive.com. Retrieved July 23, 2016.Kuyt, Sherry (May 26, 2016). "Wayland Brewery Owner Prepares for Summer Opening", MLive.com. Retrieved July 23, 2016."Wayland, Michigan – Road Trippin'", WWMT, August 4, 2016. Retrieved August 21, 2016. OpenRoad brews a variety of craft beers, including the Road Rage Double IPA, I.P.A. Lot, Citradisiac Pale Ale, My Coffee Stout, Bumpy Ride Brown, 90 mph IPA, Pennywise Porter, Good Rye-Brations IPA, Yell-Ale Submarine and Campout Cream Ale.OpenRoad Brewery at RateBeer. Retrieved July 23, 2016. Several seasonal and experimental brews are planned. The brewery opened in 2016. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Beer brewing companies based in Michigan Category:American companies established in 2016 Category:2016 establishments in Michigan
title: OpenRoad Brewery
